participant_1.background: i hate school. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic about food, loves to share experiences.
participant_2.background: i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food.
